reviewText: I enjoyed the work of 8 millimeters of nostalgic films.

Wasted my money on this grainy and substandard example of 'classic porn'.  Street Pete's commentary is superfluous and rather uninteresting.  I won't buy 42nd Street anything from now on.  Internet porn blows this junk out of the water!

This was a HUGE waist of money. Indeed these are old movies, but they do not show much and the climax scenes are non existant. This is little more than a collection of soft core movies. Not worth it at all and I will never by the 42nd Street Pete's brand again.

A week before viewing the DVD, I was telling the younger guys at work how lucky they are, to have DVD's and VHS's and Cable. It brings back memories of feeding the projector, and hoping the film didn't break and  hanging up a white bedsheet if you did't have a screen.. I have to share this with a fellow "ART" Lover, before he retires in June.
